title: Condensed Font ID
content:
Hi all,

Any help in identifying this font would be much appreciated.

Thanks in advance,

david

comments.content: I think that's Trade Gothic no. 20

Yes I thought so too but wanted to double check, or see if there were any alternatives.

Thanks very much
